name: Guns N' Gauntlets (aipeters)
description:
This is a personal account, if you landed hear, make sure to play the updated game on our CAGD school profile here instead of this game.

Hey, we updated some bugs to our game, but make sure to follow this link for our game instead.
https://cagd.itch.io/guns-n-gauntlets

Guns N’ Gauntlets is a single-player action shooter game inspired by roguelikes to pit the player against waves of enemies and encourages exploration to find upgrades to survive and beat a series of levels. Your goal is to combine guns and grab attachments to beef up your gun or swap them out instead to adapt to the waves of enemy types.

The city is lost, but you aren’t. Not yet at least. Survive the horrors of a long-lost city and try to make it out alive. Maybe you just might find yourself in the wreckage of a civilization long lost and dead, and face the horror that lingers in these alleyways.
